original: bye da🔽@#/_/_khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi sgrub thabs/ka
analyzed: bye da @#/_/_khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi sgrub thabs/ka
translated: Homage to the king of wrathful ones, Acala.

original: @/_/#/_/khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/khro bo mi g.yo
analyzed: @/_/#/_/khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/khro bo mi g.yo
translated: In the sadhana of Acala,🔽later visualize a curved knife at the heart.

original: mgon gyi sgrub thabs la/_phyis thugs khar gri gug bsam/_de'i chang zung nang du pad nyi steng du hum🔽bsams la/_de las sprul pa'i khro chung lag na mtshhon cha sna tshhogs thogs pa spros la bgegs thams cad tshhar bcad nas sgrub
analyzed: mgon gyi sgrub thabs la/_phyis thugs khar gri gug bsam/_de'i chang zung nang du pad nyi steng du hum bsams la/_de las sprul pa'i khro chung lag na mtshhon cha sna tshhogs thogs pa spros la bgegs thams cad tshhar bcad nas sgrub
translated: Within the handle, on a lotus and sun, visualize a hum.

original: pa po re re'i mdun na yang khro chung dpag tu med pa bgegs bsrun par bsams la bzlas pa bya'o gsung ngo /_/bdag nyid
analyzed: pa po re re'i mdun na yang khro chung dpag tu med pa bgegs bsrun par bsams la bzlas pa bya'o gsung ngo /_/bdag nyid
translated: From that, emanate small wrathful ones holding various weapons. Having slaughtered all obstructors, the practitioner should visualize in front of each of them countless small wrathful ones protecting against obstructors and perform the recitation.🔽Visualize oneself as Acala, without ornaments, on a multicolored lotus and sun disk.

original: sna tshhogs pad+ma nyi ma las mi g.yo mgon po rin po che'i rgyan ma yin dang snyen pa'i dus su sngas su ma 'dal la phur
analyzed: sna tshhogs pad+ma nyi ma las mi g.yo mgon po rin po che'i rgyan ma yin dang snyen pa'i dus su sngas su ma 'dal la phur
translated: At the time of the recitation, place the kila in the cushion of the mandala.🔽Arrange a torma made of the three whites, the three sweets, and so forth.

original: bu btshugs la/_de'i rtshar dkar gsum mngar gsum la byas pa'i gtor ma'i gtor ma bsham/_sku mdog dud pa
analyzed: bu btshugs la/_de'i rtshar dkar gsum mngar gsum la byas pa'i gtor ma'i gtor ma bsham/_sku mdog dud pa
translated: The body color is smoky blue.

original: byung ba lta bu dud kha sngo skya zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas ral gri g.yon na thod khrag
analyzed: byung ba lta bu dud kha sngo skya zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas ral gri g.yon na thod khrag
translated: The color of smoke, with a blue tinge, one face, two arms, the right holding a sword, the left a blood-filled skull cup,

original: bsnams pa/_rang nyid stong par bsam pa'i ngang las hum du gyur pa las hum las de'i snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil
analyzed: bsnams pa/_rang nyid stong par bsam pa'i ngang las hum du gyur pa las hum las de'i snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil
translated: From the state of visualizing oneself as empty, it becomes a hūṃ, from which a sun maṇḍala is generated in the heart of the hūṃ.🔽On top of that, visualize a hūṃ and so on.

original: 'khor bskyed de'i steng du hum la sogs pa bsgom par bsam bskyed bskyed na ji ltar bskyed na gong du ji ltar bstan pa
analyzed: 'khor bskyed de'i steng du hum la sogs pa bsgom par bsam bskyed bskyed na ji ltar bskyed na gong du ji ltar bstan pa
translated: If it is asked how it is generated, it is generated as previously explained.

original: ltar bskyed dud ka la sogs pa de nas bsnyen pa'i dus su/_om tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hu~m
analyzed: ltar bskyed dud ka la sogs pa de nas bsnyen pa'i dus su/_om tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hu~m
translated: After that, at the time of the recitation, recite oṃ caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: phat/_zhes dang por yi ge re re la yang 'bum tshho sum bcu sum 'bum gsum 'bum bzlas so/_/
analyzed: phat/_zhes dang por yi ge re re la yang 'bum tshho sum bcu sum 'bum gsum 'bum bzlas so/_/
translated: At first, each syllable is recited 300,000 times.

original: khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi sgrub thabs
analyzed: khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi sgrub thabs
translated: Sādhana of the Wrathful One Acala

original: de nas las byed pa'i dus su mi rus las byas pa'i phur pa lcags la byas kyang mi sto sor
analyzed: de nas las byed pa'i dus su mi rus las byas pa'i phur pa lcags la byas kyang mi sto sor
translated: Next, at the time of performing the rite, a kīla made of human bone is best, but if that is not available, it is also suitable to make it from iron.

original: bzhi pa 'am drug pa'am bcu gnyis pa la cig la/_mi g.yo mgon du stong pa las hum de mi g.yo ba rang
analyzed: bzhi pa 'am drug pa'am bcu gnyis pa la cig la/_mi g.yo mgon du stong pa las hum de mi g.yo ba rang
translated: From the emptiness of the protector Acala, a hūṃ becomes Acala himself.🔽Generate him as similar to oneself, and invite the gnosis being. In his heart, on a sun, is a hūṃ,

original: 'dra bar bskyed la/_ye shes sems dpa' gzhug de'i snying khar nyi ma la hum/_de la sngags kyi bskor bar bsam/
analyzed: 'dra bar bskyed la/_ye shes sems dpa' gzhug de'i snying khar nyi ma la hum/_de la sngags kyi bskor bar bsam/
translated: surrounded by the mantra.

original: bdag gi sngags brjod pas snying kha nas langs/_zhal du byung phur pa'i zhal du thim/_de'i snying kha'i sngags las ye🔽shes kyi bcud blangs nas bdag gi snying khar thim zhing /_de ltar 'khor bar bsam mo/_/thung stong na phur pa
analyzed: bdag gi sngags brjod pas snying kha nas langs/_zhal du byung phur pa'i zhal du thim/_de'i snying kha'i sngags las ye shes kyi bcud blangs nas bdag gi snying khar thim zhing /_de ltar 'khor bar bsam mo/_/thung stong na phur pa
translated: Recite one’s own mantra, and it arises from the heart, emerges from the mouth, and dissolves into the mouth of the kīla.🔽The elixir of gnosis is taken from the mantra in his heart and dissolves into one’s heart.🔽Think that it circulates in that way.

original: sngags dang bcas pa gtshang thon byas nas btab gin snying khar thim phur pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dam tshhig sems dpa'
analyzed: sngags dang bcas pa gtshang thon byas nas btab gin snying khar thim phur pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dam tshhig sems dpa'
translated: If one recites the mantra a thousand times, the kīla together with the mantra is expelled and strikes the heart.🔽The gnosis being of the kīla becomes the samaya being and enters the kīla.🔽Think that and meditate.

original: phur par song bar bsam mo/_bsgoms la/_ling kha la bstan pa'i dus su zhabs bzhi pa la_/
analyzed: phur par song bar bsam mo/_bsgoms la/_ling kha la bstan pa'i dus su zhabs bzhi pa la_/
translated: When it is shown to the effigy, it has four feet.

original: dang pos kha/_gnyis pas snying /_gsum pas lte ba/_bzhi pas su pus🔽gtshugs ltar bskums pa'o/_/gong du bsnyen pa bya'o/_/ling ka'i rgyu bstan pa spra tshhil gyi🔽gser du thal chen dum zhig gtang gsung lam thal chen 'am/_bag zan nam gang yang rung /🔽las ling ka mgo bo shar du bstan la gan rkyal du bya'o/_/byas ste/_skye tshhe dang /_re'u lcags🔽dang 'khor lo'i snag tshha byed par 'dod pas/_nya'i rnga gshog rnams brdungs la/_khrag
analyzed: dang pos kha/_gnyis pas snying /_gsum pas lte ba/_bzhi pas su pus gtshugs ltar bskums pa'o/_/gong du bsnyen pa bya'o/_/ling ka'i rgyu bstan pa spra tshhil gyi gser du thal chen dum zhig gtang gsung lam thal chen 'am/_bag zan nam gang yang rung / las ling ka mgo bo shar du bstan la gan rkyal du bya'o/_/byas ste/_skye tshhe dang /_re'u lcags dang 'khor lo'i snag tshha byed par 'dod pas/_nya'i rnga gshog rnams brdungs la/_khrag
translated: The first one is for the heart, the second one is for the navel, the third one is for the secret place, and the fourth one is for the soles of the feet.

original: dang rang gi srin lag gi sbyar te/_gro ga la shog bu'am rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i dkyil du/🔽ming dang sngags su spel la bris gsod na ma ra ya la sogs pa bri ste/_snying kar gzhug
analyzed: dang rang gi srin lag gi sbyar te/_gro ga la shog bu'am rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i dkyil du/🔽ming dang sngags su spel la bris gsod na ma ra ya la sogs pa bri ste/_snying kar gzhug
translated: The method of making the effigy is as follows: It is said that one should use a piece of human bone, or a piece of charnel ground cloth, or a piece of human skin, or a piece of human flesh, or a piece of human bone, or a piece of human hair, or a piece of human nail, or a piece of human tooth, or a piece of human skull, or a piece of human sinew, or a piece of human tendon, or a piece of human blood, or a piece of human brain, or a piece of human fat, or a piece of human marrow, or a piece of human skin, or a piece of human bone, or a piece of human hair, or a piece of human nail, or a piece of human tooth, or a piece of human skull, or a piece of human sinew, or a piece of human tendon, or a piece of human blood, or a piece of human brain, or a piece of human fat, or a piece of human marrow, or a piece of human skin, or a piece of human bone, or a piece of human hair, or a piece of human nail, or a piece of human tooth, or a piece of human skull, or a piece of human sinew, or a piece of human tendon, or a piece of human blood, or a piece of human brain, or a piece of human fat, or a piece of human marrow, or a piece of human skin, or a piece of human bone, or a piece of human hair, or a piece of human nail, or a piece of human tooth, or a piece of human skull, or a piece of human sinew, or a piece of human tendon, or a piece of human blood, or a piece of human brain, or a piece of human fat, or a piece of human marrow, or a piece of human skin, or a piece of human bone, or a piece of human hair, or a piece of human nail, or a piece of human tooth, or a piece of human skull, or a piece of human sinew, or a piece of human tendon, or a piece of human blood, or a piece of human brain, or a piece of human fat, or a piece of human marrow, or a piece of human skin, or

original: bcug la phur bus btab la ma 'dal dur khrod kyi thal bas mi mngon par phur pa dang bcas pa mi mngon par bkab la
analyzed: bcug la phur bus btab la ma 'dal dur khrod kyi thal bas mi mngon par phur pa dang bcas pa mi mngon par bkab la
translated: Having inserted it, stamp it down with the kīla. Cover it with the charnel ground’s ash so that it is not visible.

original: nam byed dam nyi phyed na me tog sngon po gtor la bzhag go/_/de nas/_om tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na che
analyzed: nam byed dam nyi phyed na me tog sngon po gtor la bzhag go/_/de nas/_om tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na che
translated: Then, at the time of the rite, at noon, scatter blue flowers and leave.

original: ge mo shig rlag ste ba ya hum phat spyi'i ming yin gsung /_ces snying khar gdab/_don
analyzed: ge mo shig rlag ste ba ya hum phat spyi'i ming yin gsung /_ces snying khar gdab/_don
translated: Then, “oṃ caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa, destroy such and such, bhayaṃ kuru hūṃ phaṭ” is the general name, it is said.🔽Thus, strike the heart.🔽The meaning is that the mind-vāyu of the person is placed above and the body is bent.

original: mi'i sems rlung steng du bzhag la lus dgug pa rdo rje la sogs pa la sngags bzlas shing dgug_/ngag gi
analyzed: mi'i sems rlung steng du bzhag la lus dgug pa rdo rje la sogs pa la sngags bzlas shing dgug_/ngag gi
translated: The mantra is recited and the person is summoned.🔽The mantra “such and such, akarośaya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ” is recited.🔽It is said that the mind-vāyu and mind are summoned simultaneously.🔽The body and mind are separated. The mind is summoned into the syllable.

original: che ge mo a kar sha ya hum hum phat bzlas so/_/yid kyi rlung sems dus gcig la dgug zer te mi gtub gsung /_lus dang sems gud gud bya sems yig 'brur dgug zhugs rngub/_dbugs rngubs la drang /_de
analyzed: che ge mo a kar sha ya hum hum phat bzlas so/_/yid kyi rlung sems dus gcig la dgug zer te mi gtub gsung /_lus dang sems gud gud bya sems yig 'brur dgug zhugs rngub/_dbugs rngubs la drang /_de
translated: Inhale the vāyu.

original: nas gso bar 'dod na ming dang bgegs thub phyis mi gnod na snying rje bas phur bu bton te/
analyzed: nas gso bar 'dod na ming dang bgegs thub phyis mi gnod na snying rje bas phur bu bton te/
translated: Then, if one wishes to heal, after the name and the obstacle are removed, if there is no harm, compassion is generated, the kīla is extracted, and the person is healed.

original: om tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hum che ge mo zhig shan ti ku ru swa ha/_zhes sngags
analyzed: om tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hum che ge mo zhig shan ti ku ru swa ha/_zhes sngags
translated: Om tshan dha ma ha ro sha na hum.

original: brjod nas btab na srod tho rangs phur pa bton te 'o mas bkrus na zhag bdun pa la sos par
analyzed: brjod nas btab na srod tho rangs phur pa bton te 'o mas bkrus na zhag bdun pa la sos par
translated: If you recite this mantra and strike the target, then in the early morning, take out the kīla and wash it with milk. In seven days, the target will be cured.

original: 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan gcig ni 'bum mo bzlas pas/🔽skal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa men sdig pa dngos mdze las sogs pa sken las
analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan gcig ni 'bum mo bzlas pas/ skal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa men sdig pa dngos mdze las sogs pa sken las
translated: Moreover, if you recite this king of mantras one hundred thousand times,🔽 all the sins accumulated over a thousand lifetimes will be purified.🔽 If you do the above and strike the knee of an enemy who is trying to escape, he will be unable to go anywhere.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra jatajata, his tongue will become paralyzed.

original: byung ba'o/_/gi sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/gong ma ltar byas ste/_tshher ma phyir🔽rgol ba'i pus mo la btshugs na/_'gro ba dang dza ta dza ta res pa'i sngags so 'ong ba rengs
analyzed: byung ba'o/_/gi sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/gong ma ltar byas ste/_tshher ma phyir rgol ba'i pus mo la btshugs na/_'gro ba dang dza ta dza ta res pa'i sngags so 'ong ba rengs
translated: If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.

original: par 'gyur ro/_/ling ka'i lce la btshugs b+ha ra hi b+ha ra hi zhes spel na lce rengs par byed do/_/
analyzed: par 'gyur ro/_/ling ka'i lce la btshugs b+ha ra hi b+ha ra hi zhes spel na lce rengs par byed do/_/
translated: If you strike the tongue of a slanderer with the mantra bharabharabhara, his tongue will become paralyzed.🔽 If you strike the tongue of a

original: mngon par spel ba dang bcas pa'i sngags u tsha ta ya bsngags pa'i dur khrod kyi thal ba sgo'i
analyzed: mngon par spel ba dang bcas pa'i sngags u tsha ta ya bsngags pa'i dur khrod kyi thal ba sgo'i
translated: If one scatters the charnel ground ash, which has been enchanted with the mantra “Ucchaṭaya” together with the intensification, above the door,

original: steng du stor na 'byer bar byed do/_/kham por gsar pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris ste
analyzed: steng du stor na 'byer bar byed do/_/kham por gsar pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris ste
translated: it will cause a schism. If one writes with red chalk on a new clay pot

original: sgo la sbyangs na/_byis pa gsar du bu btshas pa bsrung bar byed do/_/dpa'
analyzed: sgo la sbyangs na/_byis pa gsar du bu btshas pa bsrung bar byed do/_/dpa'
translated: and applies it to the door, it will protect the newly born child.🔽From the Tantra of the Single Hero

original: bo cig du bsgrub pa'i rgyud las/_pan+di ta chen po rad na shri rnye nas phyung ba
analyzed: bo cig du bsgrub pa'i rgyud las/_pan+di ta chen po rad na shri rnye nas phyung ba
translated: Extracted by the Great Paṇḍita Ratnākaraśānti🔽It is finished.🔽The protection is: “Protect the child of so-and-so, hum hum phat.”

original: rdzogs so//_// phan 'dogs pa ni/_yi ge \u0fbfpa che ge mo'i byis pa srungs cig hum hum phat ces pa kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du
analyzed: rdzogs so//_// phan 'dogs pa ni/_yi ge \u0fbfpa che ge mo'i byis pa srungs cig hum hum phat ces pa kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du
translated: Write this twice between two joined palm-tree leaves.🔽From the hum generate the Bhagavat,🔽introduce the awareness being,

original: gnyis bris te sa las hum de las bcom ldan 'das su bskyed la/_ye shes sems dpa' gzhug_/skud pa ser po
analyzed: gnyis bris te sa las hum de las bcom ldan 'das su bskyed la/_ye shes sems dpa' gzhug_/skud pa ser po
translated: wrap it with a yellow thread,🔽and tie it to the lintel above the door.

original: dkris la sgo'i nam rol du ya them la btags so/_/'dogs tsham na rnam pa kham bor du bya gsung /
analyzed: dkris la sgo'i nam rol du ya them la btags so/_/'dogs tsham na rnam pa kham bor du bya gsung /
translated: When tying it, it is said that one should do it in the form of a clay pot.

original: khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi sgrub thabs/
analyzed: khro bo mi g.yo mgon gyi sgrub thabs/
translated: The Sādhana of the Wrathful Protector Acala
